generatedTitle: Evolution of the Rolex Daytona Movement

extractFactDictList.question: What is the Rolex Daytona known for?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The watch is known for its high-performance features and has been a favorite among watch enthusiasts and collectors.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the Rolex Daytona first introduced?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Rolex Daytona was first introduced in 1963 as a high-performance chronograph watch.

extractFactDictList.question: What was the Zenith movement known for?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The Zenith movement was a high-quality movement that provided excellent accuracy and reliability.

extractFactDictList.question: Why did Rolex switch to an in-house movement?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This decision was made to ensure greater control over the quality and performance of the watch.

extractFactDictList.question: When was the in-house movement first introduced in the Rolex Daytona?
